Services

Whether you need to generate more leads, or educate and nurture your prospects, I can help you write:


  • White Paper Plans

  • White Papers

  • Website Copy/Content

  • Promotional and Informational Emails

  • Sales/Landing Pages

  • E-newsletter Articles

  • Product Brochures

  • Product Descriptions

  • Sales Funnel Package

  • And more...


Targeted Marketing

When we work together, we will focus on critical things to your marketing piece's success such as:


  • Understanding the key "pain points" of your primary target audience and illustrating it in your copy

  • Having a strong offer that boosts lead-gen response

  • Focusing on proof and specifics that reeks of credibility and potential ROI

  • Educating and nurturing your leads with resourceful information that positions you as a trusted expert in their eyes

  • Knocking down your prospect's buying objections and reducing your product's perceived risk

  • Differentiating your product's value proposition against competing brands

  • Making it easy for your prospects to take the next step


To see some samples of my work, click here.


If you've got other projects in mind, contact me at josef@josefadlao.com, and let's find out how I can help you.
